on reading compounds: 任意【ニンイ】optional, voluntary, arbitrary, random, discretionary, facultative, spontaneous, any, arbitrary
在任【ザイニン】being in office
kun reading compounds: 任せる【まかせる】to entrust (e.g. a task) to another, to leave to, to passively leave to someone else's facilities, to leave to take its natural course, to continue (something) in a natural fashion (without particular aim), to rely fully on one's (full strength, great ability, long time taken) to get something done
任す【まかす】to entrust, to leave to a person
